titleStmt.title: SII 8.66: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 66. (A.R. No. 477 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE FIRST PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭan=taiyum porcayap pāvaiyuñ cirttanic celviyun=taṉ perun=te viyarāki yiṉpuṟa neṭutiyal lūḻiyil liṭaituṟaināṭun=tuṭarvaṉavelip paṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷicūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟ karumuṟaṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porukaṭal liḻattaraicartam muṭiyu māṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyum muṉṉavarpakkal teṉṉavar vaitta cun=taramuṭiyu min=tiraṉāramum teṉticai Iḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟipaṭaik keraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyil cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatirmālaiyuñ caṅkatirvelait tolperuṅkāval palpaḻan=tivuñ ceruviṟ ciṉavi lirupattorukā laraicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ mevaruñ cān=timaṟṟivaraṇ karuti Iruttiya cempoṟ ṟiruttakumuṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika mucaṅkiyil mutukiṭ ṭoḷitta cayaciṅkaṉ Aḷapperum pukaḻoṭum piṭiyal Iraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiyilakkamum navanetik kulapperumalaiykaḷum vikkiramavīrar cakkirakoṭṭamum mutirpaṭavalla maturamaṇṭalamum kāmiṭaiy vaḷar nāmaṇaikoṇaiyum veñcilaivirar pañcappaḷḷi
ṇitecamum Ayarvil vaṇkirtti yātiñakaravaiyiṟ can=tiran tolkulat tin=tirarataṉai viḷaiyamarkkaḷattuk kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittup palataṉattoṭu niṟaikulataṉak kuvaiyuṅ kiṭṭaruñ ceṟimiḷai yoṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcurarcer nalkkocalaināṭu n=taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟaicolait taṇṭapputtiyum Iraṇacūraṉai muraṇukat tākki tikkaṇai kirttit takkaṇalāṭamuṅ kovin=ta can=taṉ māviḻin=toṭat taṅkātacāral vaṅkāḷatecamum toṭukaṭaṟ caṅkuvoṭṭal mahivāḷaṉai veñcamarviḷākat tañcuvittaruḷi Oṇṭiṟa liyāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nittila neṭuṅkaṭa luttiralāṭamum veṟimalar tirttat teripuṉaṟ kaṅkaiyum Alaikaṭal naṭuvuṭ palakalañ celuttic caṅkirāmavicaiyo
taraiyaṉai vākaiyam porukaṭaṟ kumpakkariyoṭu makappaṭut turimaiyiṟp piṟakkiya perunetip piṟakkamum Ārttava nakanakarp porttoḻil vācalil viccātiratoraṇamum moyttoḷir puṉaimaṇip putavamuṅ kaṉamaṇik katavamum niṟaicīrvicaiyamu n=tuṟainīrp panṉaiyum vaṉmalai yūreyiṟ ṟoṉmalaiyūrum Āḻkaṭa lakaḻcūḻ māyiruṭiṅkamuṅ kalaṅkā valviṉai Ilaṅkācopamuṅ koppuṟu niṟaipuṉal māppappāḷamuṅ kāvalampuricai mevilipaṅkamum vaḷaippain=tūṟuṭai viḷaippain=tūṟuṅ kalaittakkor pukaḻ talaittakkolamun titamāvalviṉai mātamaliṅkamuṅ kalāmutir kaṭun=tiṟa lilāmuritecamum teṉakkavārpoḻil māṉakkavāramu n=toṭukaṭaṟk kāvaṟ kaṭumuṟaṭ
ṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecaripanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājentracoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 9Āvatu Uṭaiyār rājentracoḻatevar paṇimakaṉ śrīcoḻamaṇṭalattu Arumoḻitevavaḷanāṭṭu Ārvalakkūṟṟattu rājarājanallūr rājarājanallūruṭaiyāṉ pāṇṭi Utaiyativākaraṉ tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyil Eḻun=taruḷuvitta piccatevarkku trisandhimukkālu n=tiruvamutuceytaruḷac ciṟukālaikku tiruvamurtarici Irunāḻiyum Ucciyampotaikkut tiruvamutarici nānāḻiyum Iravaikku tiruvamutarici Irunāḻiyum Āka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku tiruvamutarici kuṟuṇiyināl Añciraṇṭu vaṇṇattāl nellu patakku nānāḻiyum sandhi Oṉṟiṉukku kaṟiyamutu paruppu Uḻakkum porikkaṟi Oṉṟum puḻukkukkaṟi Oṉṟum Ākakkaṟi
lu nāḻi yuriyāka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku nellu nānāḻi yuriyum nāḷ Oṉṟiṉuk=ku miḷaku Irucceviṭaraik=kum Uppu Āḻāk=kuk=kum nellu nāḻi Uḻak=kum sandhi Oṉṟuk=ku neyyamutu Iruceviṭaraiyāka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku neyyamutu Āḻāk=ke Irucevi ṭaraikku nellu Irunāḻiyum sandhi Oṉṟuk=ku tayiramurtu Uriyāka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku tayiramutu nāḻi Urik=ku nellu nāḻi yuriyum sandhi Oṉṟuk=ku Aṭaikkāyamutu veṟumpākku nālum veṟṟilai Eṭṭum Āka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku veṟumpākku paṉṉiraṇṭukkum veṟṟilai yirupattunālukku nellu nāḻi yuriyum sandhiviḷakku ciṟukāṭṭilaikku Iraṇṭum Ucciyampotaikku Iraṇṭum Iṟavaikku nālum Āka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉuk=ku sandhiviḷakku Eṭṭiṉuk=ku Eṇṇai yurik=ku nellu nāṉāḻiyum tiruvārātaṉai ceyvāṉ
Uḷpaṭa nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku nellu kuṟuṇiyum Āka nāḷ Oṉṟiṉukku tiruvaṇṇāmalai Eṉṉum marakkālāl nellu Aiṅkuṟuṇi Irunāḻi muvuḻakkāka Orāṭṭaik=ku nellu nūṟṟaṟupatiṉ kalaṉe muk=kuṟuṇi Aṟunāḻi Iṉṉellukku vilaikkuk koṇṭa nilamāvatu tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiyār tevatāṉaṅ kiḻaṇṇāttu nālāṭikkiṇa ṟuṭppaṭa kiḻaippaṭṭiyum naṭuviṟpaṭṭiyum melaippaṭṭiyum Ālaiyettappaṭṭiyum Ākap paṭṭi nālukkum kiḻpāṟkellai naṅkaikoyiṟpaṭṭik=kum AṇaiŌṭaik=kum meṟk=kum teṉpāṟkellai periyeri vāykkāluk=ku vaṭakkum melpāṟkkellai Aricāṇippaṭṭikkum ciṟṟattiEttappaṭṭikkum kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai vaṭakkil ciṟṟatti yettappaṭṭik=kut teṟkkum
m Uṭpaṭṭa nilam Uṇṇilam Oḻiviṉṟiye tiruvaṇṇāmalai Uṭaiyār Aruḷāl śaṇḍeśvaradevarum tevakaṉmikaḷumpakkal poruḷaṟa k=kuṭuttu vilaiyaṟak koṇṭa Innilam Uḻutu melvārattāl van=ta nellu tevarpaṇṭāratte Aḷappatānom kiḻaṇṇāttuūrom Innelluk koṇṭu Innivan=tam tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyeṉṉum marakkālāle śantrātittaval tevarpaṇṭārattile koṇṭu niccal nivan=tañ celuttakkaṭavomānom tevakaṉmikaḷom Ivaṉṉe tiruvaṇṇāmalaiuṭaiyār tirukkārttikait tirunāḷil tiruveṭṭai EḻuntaruḷiIrun=tāl perun=tiruvamirtu ceytaruḷavum Aṭiyārkkuc caṭṭiccoṟu prasādañceytaruḷavum kuṭutta poṉ Eḻu kaḻaiñcil Ittevar tevatāṉa brahmate
ṅgalattu sabhaiyoṅ koṇṭa poṉ nāṟkkaḻaiñcukku Āṇṭuvarai kaḻaiñciṉvāy ttiruvaṇṇāmalaiyeṉṉum marakkālāl nelluk kalamāka tiruvamitarici kalattuk=ku nellu Irukalane tūṇip patak=kum kaṟiyamirtu Aiñcuk=ku nellu patakku nānāḻiyum puḷiṅkaṟiyamirtuk=ku nellu mukkuṟuṇiyum miḷaku Āḻāk=kuk=ku nellu nānāḻiyum Uppu nāḻik=ku nellu Irunāḻiyum cirakam Oruceviṭe kāluk=ku nellu Irunāḻiyum neyyamirtu nāḻikku nellup patakkum tayiramirtu kuṟuṇikku nellu Irunāḻiyum vāḻaippaḻam Eṭṭiṉukku nellu nānāḻiyum Aṭaikkāyamitu veṟuṅkāy Irupatukkum veṟṟilai Eṇpatukkum nellu nānāḻiyum vāḻaikkuruttukku nellu Irunāḻiyum viṟakukku nellu kuṟuṇiyum kucakkalattukku nellu tūṇiyum Aṭuvārk=ku nellup patakkum Āka nellu nāṟkkalattukkuc can=tirātittava
tuvomānom puliyūrnāṭiścaturvvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom . vayiramekaścaturvvetimaṅkalattu sagaiyoṅ koṇṭa poṉ kkaḻaiñcukku Āṇṭuvarai kaḻaiñciṉvāyp poliŪṭṭut tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyeṉṉum marakkālāl nelluk kalamāka Uṭaiyār tiruveṭṭai Eḻun=taruḷiIrun=tu caṭṭiccoṟu prasādañceytaruḷa caṭṭi Oṉṟuk=ku Arici Irunāḻiyāka caṭṭi Irupatukku Arici Aiyṅkuṟuṇikku Aiñciraṇṭākki nelluk kalane nānāḻiyum kaṟi Aiñcukku nellu Aiṅkuṟuṇiyum puḷiṅkaṟikku nellu tūṇiyum miḷaku Uḻak=kuk=ku nelluk kuṟuṇiyum Uppu nāḻi Urikku nellu muṉṉāḻiyum cirakam Iruceviṭaraikku nellu nānāḻiyum caṭṭi Oṉṟukku ney Iruceviṭaraiyāka ney nāḻi Uḻak=kuk=ku nellup patakku nānāḻiyum caṭṭi Oṉṟukku tayir Uriyākat tayirk kuṟuṇi Irunāḻikku nellu kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum veruṅkāy Eṇpatukku
nellu k=kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum Aṭaveṇṭuṅ kucakkalattukkum caṭṭi Irupatuk=kum perakal nāṟpatuk=kum ciṟṟakal Irupatukkum nellu Aiṅkuṟuṇiyum virakukku nellu Aiññāḻiyum Aṭuvārk=ku nellu kkuṟuṇiyum caṭṭi mūṭikkuṭukkum vāḻaiyilaikku nellu nānāḻiyum Āka nellu mukkalattukkum poṉ mukkaḻaiñcuṅ koṇṭu śantrātittaval Ipparice Innivantam celuttavomānom vayiramekaścaturvvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom . Ivaṉe tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyuṭaiyārkku pañcagavyamāṭiyaruḷa nittamum ciṟukālaisantiyil tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyeṉṉum nāḻiyāl gomuttraram Uḻakkum gomayam Āḻākkum pāl nāḻiUḻakkum tayir nāḻiUriyum ney nāḻiyum Āka Ippaṭi nittamum muṭṭa
ṉ Eḻun=taruḷuvitta piccatevarkku vaitta tirununtāviḷakku Iraṇṭukku viṭṭa cāvā muvāp perāṭu nūṟṟutoṇṇūṟṟu Iraṇṭu Ivvāṭu koṇṭu Ittirununtāviḷakku Iraṇṭukku nicatappaṭiyum muṭṭāme śantrātittaval Erippatānom tiruvaṇṇāmalai maṉṟāṭikaḷom Ivaṉe Uṭaiyār śrīvimāṉattai cūḻa Irāvaisandhikku Aṇukkaviḷakkāka Eriya vaitta viḷakku Oṉṟukku Eṇṇai Iruceviṭaraiyāka sandhiviḷakkup patiṉāliṉukku viṭṭa cāvā muvāp perāṭu muṉṉūṟṟu muppattāṟu Ivvāṭu koṇ ṭiccan=tiviḷakkup patiṉālum niccaṟppaṭiyum muṭṭāme can=tirātittaval Erippatāṉo n=tiruvaṇṇāmalai maṉṟāṭikaḷom .
A portion is built in at the right end.
Digital edition of SII 8.66 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
